interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: eBoot 100 Pack of U Shaped Hair Pins Bun Hair Pins with Box and Storage Bag, Golden (6 cm/ 2.36 Inches)
Review Date: 2018/01/22
Store: EBOOT
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'EBOOT', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Unit Count': '100 Count', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.36 x 0.04 x 0.35 inches; 3.36 Ounces', 'UPC': '712971921153'}
Review Text: At first I thought they were amazing but then I realized they kept slipping out of my hair because the second I would put them in my hair they would loose their bend and double the opening. Will be returning!!!
Review Title: Not amazing like I hoped 😔
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
14 in 1 Combo Set Professional White Clear Pink Powder DIY Acryic Nail Art Decorations Kit Brush Cuticle Revitalizer Oil Pen Tools Rhinestones Sanding Buffer Forms Nail Tips Glue Set
RY
{'Material': 'Acrylic', 'Brand': 'RY', 'Item Form': 'Powder'}
First off, I could smell the acrylic the second I opened it. The powders had powder on the outside of the jars, the brush is the size of a Qtip and hard like it was used. The worst part that pist me off so bad, the glue was half gone and a solid chunk. I doubt I will get new glue from them so I'm screwed. (Stores were closed by the time I realized it). Other than ALL that I guess it's ok. Wish I would have gotten a better one for couple dollars more!
So irritating!!!
eBoot 100 Pack of U Shaped Hair Pins Bun Hair Pins with Box and Storage Bag, Golden (6 cm/ 2.36 Inches)

profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Focus**: Beauty and personal care, specifically nail art and acrylic supplies, but has recently purchased hair accessories as well.
- **Quality Expectations**: Expects high-quality products; has a history of dissatisfaction with product condition and functionality, particularly regarding durability and performance.
- **Frustration Tolerance**: Shows low tolerance for product defects, as evidenced by recent frustration over hair pins that failed to remain secure in use, resulting in a return. Continues to express irritation over incomplete or unsatisfactory items.
- **Value Sensitivity**: Disappointed with perceived value; willing to pay more for better quality, especially when products do not meet expectations.
- **Material Preferences**: Engaged with acrylic materials but previously noted negative experiences with strong chemical odors. Recent purchase of hair pins indicates a broader interest in hair care products.
- **Review Patterns**: Actively utilizes reviews to express both negative experiences and expectations for product performance; recent review highlights disappointment with product functionality and reliability, reinforcing a pattern of detailed feedback based on personal experience.

This updated profile reflects the user's consistent expectations of quality and functionality across different beauty products.
